title: Nutriota Propolis | 1000 mg (120 Tablets)
aboutContent: NATURALLY STRENGTHENS THE IMMUNE SYSTEM: Bee propolis is one of the richest sources of bioflavonoids found in nature, making it an ultimate source of Natural protection. Bee propolis has been used for centuries to treat sore throats and other various conditions and helps to effectively and naturally strengthen the immune system. PURE AND NATURAL: Our propolis tablets are made from high quality bee propolis extract and contain no artificial additives. POWERFUL ANTIOXIDANT: Propolis is rich in polyphenols, flavonoids and bioflavonoids, making it a powerful antioxidant and anti-inflammatory supplement. HIGH CONCENTRATION: Each of our high concentration tablets contains 2000mg of bee propolis resin extract.
descriptionContent: Naturally strengthen your immune system with Nutriota Propolis, a high-concentration supplement derived from pure bee propolis. Rich in polyphenols and bioflavonoids, these tablets provide powerful antioxidant support and have been traditionally used to relieve sore throats. This pure, natural formula contains no artificial additives, offering an effective way to support your overall well-being.
ingredientsContent: Propolis Resin, Filling Agent (Microcrystalline Cellulose), Glazing Agent (Hydroxypropyl methylcellulose, Glycerin, Carnauba Wax), Anti-Clumping Agent (Magnesium Stearate, Silicon Dioxide) Allergen: Tree Resin
generalInfoContent:
Units: 120 count
Brand: Nutriota
Format: Tablet
Age Range Description: Adult
Country of origin: United Kingdom
